instruction: You are an oncology AI assistant for an LMIC TB/HIV clinic. Given the patient case below, output the correct TNM staging and a resource-constrained treatment regimen that respects local drug availability.
input:
Patient profile: {"age_band": "35-45", "hiv_status": true, "cancer_type": "B-cell_lymphoma", "comorbidities": ["HIV+", "pulmonary_TB_suspect"], "cd4_note": "CD4=85"}
AI proposed staging: IIB
AI proposed regimen: R-CHOP
Local inventory note: drugs may be out of stock.
output:
Corrected staging: IVB
Corrected regimen: CHOP + Liposomal_Doxorubicin
Clinical reason: Bone marrow involvement on biopsy confirms Stage IVB. Rituximab unavailable locally.

instruction: You are an oncology AI assistant for an LMIC TB/HIV clinic. Given the patient case below, output the correct TNM staging and a resource-constrained treatment regimen that respects local drug availability.
input:
Patient profile: {"age_band": "55-65", "hiv_status": true, "cancer_type": "Kaposi_sarcoma", "comorbidities": ["HIV+"], "cd4_note": "CD4=200"}
AI proposed staging: T1 I0 S0
AI proposed regimen: Liposomal_Doxorubicin
Local inventory note: drugs may be out of stock.
output:
Corrected staging: T1 I1 S1
Corrected regimen: Liposomal_Doxorubicin + ART optimization
Clinical reason: Immune suppression (CD4=85) and systemic symptoms upgrade to S1. ART regimen needs review.

instruction: You are an oncology AI assistant for an LMIC TB/HIV clinic. Given the patient case below, output the correct TNM staging and a resource-constrained treatment regimen that respects local drug availability.
input:
Patient profile: {"age_band": "35-45", "hiv_status": true, "cancer_type": "B-cell_lymphoma", "comorbidities": ["HIV+", "renal_impairment"], "cd4_note": "CD4=310"}
AI proposed staging: IIA
AI proposed regimen: CHOP + Methotrexate
Local inventory note: drugs may be out of stock.
output:
Corrected staging: IIA
Corrected regimen: CHOP (Methotrexate contraindicated — eGFR < 30)
Clinical reason: Renal impairment makes Methotrexate unsafe. Standard CHOP without MTX.

instruction: You are an oncology AI assistant for an LMIC TB/HIV clinic. Given the patient case below, output the correct TNM staging and a resource-constrained treatment regimen that respects local drug availability.
input:
Patient profile: {"age_band": "45-55", "hiv_status": true, "cancer_type": "lung_adenocarcinoma", "comorbidities": ["HIV+", "active_TB"], "cd4_note": "CD4=45"}
AI proposed staging: IIIA
AI proposed regimen: Carboplatin + Paclitaxel
Local inventory note: drugs may be out of stock.
output:
Corrected staging: IIIA
Corrected regimen: Defer chemo — treat TB first. Reassess in 8 weeks.
Clinical reason: Active TB must be treated before cytotoxic chemotherapy. AI missed active infection flag.

instruction: You are an oncology AI assistant for an LMIC TB/HIV clinic. Given the patient case below, output the correct TNM staging and a resource-constrained treatment regimen that respects local drug availability.

AI proposed regimen: Cisplatin + RT

output:
